title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors

jump_scares.spoiler: Kristen grabs the tap handle which then wraps around her hand
Something pops up underneath the mat on the floor
A large worm-like creature lifts up through the floor underneath Kristen
Hands reach out of both sides of the TV
Neil steals a cross but is immediately grabbed on his shoulder by a hand
A claw suddenly rips through the wall after Nancy says “How do we find him Kristen?”
Kristen’s mother is pulled through the doorway
Taryn watches as a man walks past, she then spins around to see Freddy behind her
Neil grabs the bag and a skeleton jumps out at him
Nancy gets struck by the bladed-glove while receiving a hug
